title: Inflation rate in Brunei Darussalam 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1984 to 1999, rapidly increasing from 1999 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2006, roughly increasing from 2006 to 2007, and finally roughly constant from 2007 to 2024.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 5.97 was reached at Year 1995
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.01 was reached at Year 1999

The line rapidly increased by 240.48% from Year 1992 to 1993,remained stable by 143.67% from Year 1994 to 1995,remained stable by 75.44% from Year 1997 to 1998,remained stable by 97.62% from Year 1998 to 1999,increased by 11600.0% from Year 1999 to 2000,increased by 281.67% from Year 2001 to 2002,remained stable by 86.9% from Year 2002 to 2003,remained stable by 200.0% from Year 2003 to 2004,remained stable by 86.24% from Year 2005 to 2006,increased by 546.67% from Year 2006 to 2007,remained stable by 115.46% from Year 2007 to 2008,remained stable by 78.85% from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 254.55% from Year 2012 to 2013,remained stable by 100.0% from Year 2014 to 2015,remained stable by 76.19% from Year 2015 to 2016,remained stable by 77.03% from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, remained stable by 114.29% from Year 2019 to 2020.
